Text:
When tasty fruits are left unattended for just a few minutes in southern India, it's a monkey's time to shine.

Watch a group of macaques run amok in a produce market, raid an empty kitchen, and ransack a bootlegger's cache of moonshine. Then you'll understand where the phrase "monkey around" comes from.
http://news.nationalgeographic.com/news/2006/10/061003-monkey-video.html
